content: row 11 p1 k2 yo k1 ssk k8 p1 repeat to end row 12 k1 p7 p2tog-tbl p3 yo p1 k1 repeat to end row 13 p1 k3 yo k2 ssk k6 p1 repeat to end row 14 k1 p5 p2tog-tbl p4 yo p2 k1 repeat to end row 15 p1 k4 yo k3 ssk k4 p1 repeat to end row 16 k1 p3 p2tog-tbl p5 yo p3 k1 repeat to end growing leaves cowl by meghan macko 2 pattern stitches continued growing leaves stitch pattern - in the round row 1 p1 k10 k2tog yo k1 p1 repeat to marker sm row 2 p1 k9 k2tog k2 yo p1 repeat to marker sm row 3 p1 k8 k2tog k1 yo k2 p1 repeat to marker sm row 4 p1 k7 k2tog k3 yo k1 p1 repeat to marker sm row 5 p1 k6 k2tog k2 yo k3 p1 repeat to marker sm row 6 p1 k5 k2tog k4 yo k2 p1 repeat to marker sm row 7 p1 k4 k2tog k3 yo k4 p1 repeat to marker sm row 8 p1 k3 k2tog k5 yo k3 p1 repeat to marker sm row 9 p1 k1 yo ssk k10 p1 repeat to marker sm row 10 p1 yo k2 ssk k9 p1 repeat to marker sm row 11 p1 k2 yo k1 ssk k8 p1 repeat to marker sm row 12 p1 k1 yo k3 ssk k7 p1 repeat to marker sm row 13 p1 k3 yo k2 ssk k6 p1 repeat to marker sm row 14 p1 k2 yo k4 ssk k5 p1 repeat to marker sm row 15 p1 k4 yo k3 ssk k4 p1 repeat to marker sm row 16 p1 k3 yo k5 ssk k3 p1 repeat to marker sm note regarding yarn overs on row 2 the yarn over falls between a knit and a purl bring the yarn forward in between the needles wrap yarn around right hand needle to the front again on row 10 the yarn over falls between purl and a knit stitch it is best to work this yarn over the opposite way as usual move yarn to back wrap forward over right hand needle bringing yarn all the way around to the back again you will need to untwist the stitch on the next round by working it through the back loop growing leaves cowl by meghan macko 3 pattern cast on 120 stitches join in round being careful not to twist stitches and place marker border row 1 rs p1 k2 p9 k2 p1 repeat to end sm repeat row 1 for two more rounds growing leaves pattern section row 4 begin growing leaves pattern make sure you are using the pattern chart or written instructions for the in-the-round version repeat all 16 row of pattern 3 5 times 59 row completed decrease row row 60 p1 ssk k11 p1 repeat to end sm row 61 p1 ssk k10 p1 repeat to end sm top border row 62
